data.message: Thank you for what you do,my dream has always been to help the homeless in some way,but the problem is how do I start,where do I get the help from, I feel strong feeling  for the homeless I feel that I know each and everyone of them,and feel useless when I can't give them what they need ,besides a meal, I pray for them everday,and ask God what it is that he wants me to do, I'm still waiting on where he will lead me or to whom, thank you for sharing your story.
